room_title: Escape room "The Informant" by Huntsville Escape Rooms in Huntsville
room_description: Brock Lassiter, a former cop, became an informant for the FBI and has been undercover for the last 4 years trying to collect enough evidence to take down the notorious crime boss, Antonio Vitelli. As his former partner in the police department, you've just received a concerning message from your friend. After finding out he's gone missing, you're taking matters into your own hands to find out what's happened. The mob and the FBI are looking for Brock, and now, so are you. Help him before time runs out!
